subject: Wages and Salaries
Football
Labor and Jobs
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L.’s labor committee and the players union held a 90-minute negotiating session Saturday, the eve of the Super Bowl and a month before the 2010 season begins without a salary cap.
snippet: The N.F.L.’s labor committee and the players union held a 90-minute negotiating session Saturday, the eve of the Super Bowl and a month before the 2010 season begins without a salary cap.
